text:
- [Narrator] AWS CloudHSM is
a hardware security module

enabling you to generate
and use cryptographic keys
on the AWS Cloud.
It simplifies cloud migration
for workloads that rely on HSMs

by giving you complete
control of your keys.
You can use industry standard APIs
to integrate with your applications
or configure AWS Key Management Service

to use your CloudHSM cluster
as a custom key store
for native integration with AWS services.

Manage your keys on
FIPS-validated hardware
protected with single tenant access
to tamper-resistant HSM instances
running in your own virtual private cloud.

CloudHSM is designed to help
you build and deploy workloads
with high reliability and low latency.

And you can use CloudHSM to
help demonstrate compliance
with security and privacy regulations.
Leave physical hardware management behind
and deploy pay-by-the-hour HSM instances

with load balancing and a
commitment to high availability.

CloudHSM also allows you
to control your costs

by adding and removing
HSMs from your cluster.

Take control of your
application's cloud security today
with AWS CloudHSM.
